Test Scenario: Verify user can login with valid credentials
Test Steps: 1. Open login page 2. Enter username 'student' 3. Enter password 'Password123' 4. Click Submit
Expected Result: User should be navigated to 'Logged In Successfully' page

Test Scenario: Verify error appears for incorrect password
Test Steps: 1. Open login page 2. Enter username 'student' 3. Enter password 'wrongpass' 4. Click Submit
Expected Result: Error message 'Your password is invalid!' should be displayed

Test Scenario: Verify error appears for incorrect username
Test Steps: 1. Open login page 2. Enter username 'wronguser' 3. Enter password 'Password123' 4. Click Submit
Expected Result: Error message 'Your username is invalid!' should be displayed

Test Steps: 1. Open login page 2. Verify the title of the page

Test Scenario: Verify the presence of Submit button
Test Steps: 1. Open login page 2. Check if Submit button is visible

Test Scenario: Verify username and password field labels
Test Steps: 1. Open login page 2. Check labels for Username and Password fields
Expected Result: Username and Password labels should be visible

Test Scenario: Verify redirected URL after successful login
Test Steps: 1. Login with valid credentials 2. Check URL after login

Test Scenario: Verify logout button appears after login
Test Steps: 1. Login with valid credentials 2. Check if logout button is visible
1. Login with invalid credentials 2. Check error message color
Expected Result: Error message color should be red (#E4434B)

Test Steps: 1. Login with valid credentials 2. Click Logout 3. Verify redirection
Expected Result: User should be redirected to login page after logout
